sentences.en: " We must not always talk in the marketplace of what happens to us in the forest. "
sentences.cn: “ 我们在市场这儿可不准谈起我们在树林里遇到的事. ”

sentences.en: Companies must be able to survive in the marketplace.
sentences.cn: 公司必须有能力在市场竞争中生存下去。

sentences.en: Competition in the financial marketplace has eroded profits.
sentences.cn: 金融市场的竞争降低了利润。

sentences.en: He made his way to the marketplace, as he had been instructed to do.
Peasants sell vegetables and eggs in the marketplace.
sentences.cn: 农民在集市卖蔬菜和鸡蛋.

sentences.en: products designed to meet the exacting standards of today's marketplace
sentences.cn: 为符合当今市场严格的标准而设计的产品

sentences.en: Some retailers worry that new regulations will hurt their ability to compete in the marketplace.
sentences.cn: 有些零售商担心新规定会削弱他们的市场竞争力。

sentences.en: The company found it hard to survive in a changing marketplace.
sentences.cn: 这家公司难以在不断变化的市场中生存.

sentences.en: The company has struggled to maintain its domination in the marketplace.
sentences.cn: 该公司奋力维持其市场优势.

sentences.en: The firm soon achieved complete dominance in the marketplace.
sentences.cn: 这家公司很快取得了在市场上的绝对支配地位.

sentences.en: The marketplace was jammed with a noisy crowd of buyers and sellers.
sentences.cn: 集市上熙熙攘攘挤满了买卖东西的人。

sentences.en: The marketplace was where commerce was traditionally carried on.
sentences.cn: 这个集市是传统的贸易场所.

sentences.en: This anticipated name change reflects the group's true independence in the marketplace.
sentences.cn: 这种预期的名称的变更,反映了该集团的真正的独立市场.

sentences.en: When they were fairly in the marketplace, their presence was greeted by a shout.
sentences.cn: 这支队伍出现在市场时, 人群中进发出一阵欢呼,向他们致意.

sentences.en: Where is the An Qing City second - hand book marketplace in?
sentences.cn: 安庆市的旧书市场在哪里?

sentences.en: Yesterday, Lange steel steel e - marketplace to continue to decline across the board.
sentences.cn: 昨日, 兰格钢铁电子交易市场钢价继续全线下跌.

words.tran_cn: 市场的；可销售的；有销路的
[贸易] 市场商人；市场营销人员
出售；在市场上进行交易；使…上市（market的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: the part of business activity that is concerned with buying and selling goods in competition with other companies
